pullRequest.body:
I've removed many porting notes that had resulted from the `simpNF` linter.

I've left in place all porting notes about removing `@[simp]` but where the proof is `rfl` or `Iff.rfl`.

</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

---

<details><summary>Decrease in tech debt: (relative, absolute) = (5.81, 0.03)</summary>

|Current number|Change|Type|
|-:|:-:|:-|
|4616|-109|porting notes|
|201|-2|disabled simpNF lints|
|1416|-1|erw|

Current commit [1953a88c54](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/commit/1953a88c54541f64eb5d198bd6bcecb2b1e872d9)
Reference commit [918ca88b4f](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/commit/918ca88b4f3d1edecee3f17f9dbaf0a0f28d704c)

You can run this locally as
```
./scripts/technical-debt-metrics.sh pr_summary
```
* The `relative` value is the weighted *sum* of the differences with weight given by the *inverse* of the current value of the statistic.
* The `absolute` value is the `relative` value divided by the total sum of the inverses of the current values (i.e. the weighted *average* of the differences).
</details>

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/12807734711/job/35708943491)
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/12807734711/job/35708943810)
I think this problem should not just be silenced, since `@[simp]` should not break the `MonoidAlgebra = Finsupp` abstraction barrier. Or is the comment not true anymore?

Given that we've chosen to define `abbrev MonoidAlgebra.single := Finsupp.single` using an `abbrev`, the abstraction barrier is pretty weak...

I've removed this porting note in favour of a comment on `abbrev single`.
A failure of `@[reassoc]` sounds like a note worth keeping.
Actually, it's working fine now, so I'll remove the hand-written lemma instead.
`simp; rfl` is a bit of a code smell. Should we leave it unremarked?

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore: survey of simp porting notes
